column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////My wife and I were in town for her birthday. We stayed at the Hotel Monaco and to our delight we found Wildberry Pancakes And Cafe only a few blocks from the hotel. We had eaten at their location in Schaumburg this past summer and had a great experience there so our expectations were pretty high. We arrived around 9:00 a.m. on a Sunday and only had to wait 5 minutes. We both ordered an omlette and split an order of biscuits and gravy. The food arrived quick
column3: and delicious! The orders are large so expect to not eat everything. The ambiance was great
column5: and the eating area was not too loud so it was easy to carry on a conversation. If you are looking for a great breakfast place to eat when staying downtown Chicago this is the place for you!
